entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
